attributes.action: Urgent call for long term unemployed to pick our fruit
attributes.additional_details: I can’t believe that Government has had to call on our students, who are trying to improve their skills and working future, and our hard working European neighbours to do this job there are so many long term unemployed.
attributes.background: I think the Government’s call for students to pick our fruit during lockdown should be extended, and prioritised, to the long term unemployed. Its an opportunity for them to do something for their country.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
